Posts.Content: my mother diagnosed with idc,pt2n0m0 ,ER/PR-,HER2+(IHC 2+)undergone surgery 3months back.doctor planned for AC-D chemo.finish ed 4cycles of AC.She has taken first cycle of docetere, she has severe side effects like peripheral neuropathy admiTted in hospital for 1 day.now doctor is recommending to stop docetere and continue herceptin for 1 year.my question is whether there will be more chance of recurrence if docetere is stopped in the middle.Does it have any effect on treatment
